amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Child Nutrition Programs for use as grants to States in support of the school breakfast program by $8,150,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Child Nutrition Programs for use as grants to States in support of the school breakfast program by $8,150,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
